comments.body: Thoughts on using `command time` here? Not a big deal either way as this test works. Just a suggestion.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +24,28 @@    - conda inspect linkages -p $PREFIX $PKG_NAME  # [not win]
    - conda inspect objects -p $PREFIX $PKG_NAME   # [osx]
    - $(which time) -v echo test

about:
